protocol.name: P-GSE48676-1
protocol.text: Analyzed with Affymetrix Expression Console, algorithm used for analysis- RMA, program-version = 1.1.2800.19935 ID_REF =  VALUE = log2 (RMA signal)

protocol.name: P-GSE48676-2
protocol.text: Three rosette leaves of 5 weeks old plants were wounded by clamping them with tweezers across the midvein. 10 min after wounding a pool of local leaves (L) (wounded leaves from 3 plants ), a pool of systemic leaves (S) (unwounded leaves from 3 wounded plants) and a pool of control leaves (C) (a pool of leaves from 3 unwounded plants) were harvested and immersed in liquid nitrogen for subsequant RNA extraction and hybridization on Affymetrix microarrays.

protocol.name: P-GSE48676-3
protocol.text: Arabidopsis ( 5 weeks old plants) were grown in soil under white light illumination in a 10-h-light/14-h-dark cycle at 21°C.

protocol.name: P-GSE48676-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted using the RNeasy Mini Kit (Qiagen,7 4904) according to manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE48676-5
protocol.text: Synthesis of cDNA was performed using the GeneChip Expression 3'-Amplification One-Cycle cDNA Synthesis Kit (Affymetrix, #900431). A starting amount of 6 ug total RNA was used for each sample. Purification of double-stranded cDNA was performed using the GeneChip Sample Clean-up Module (Affymetrix, #900371). Purified cRNA was enzymatically fragmented and biotinylated using GeneChip IVT Labeling Kit (Affymetrix, #900449).

protocol.name: P-GSE48676-6
protocol.text: Samples were hybridized using Affymetrix hybridization kit materials • Heat cocktails at 99° for 5 minutes, then 45° for 5 minutes centrifuge at max speed for 5 minutes (N.B. this deviates from Affy SOP). • Transfer 200 μl of hyb solution to each array, then tape holes with parafilm. Hybridize 16 hours at 45° at 60rpm• Fluidics washing protocol is FS450_0004.

protocol.name: P-GSE48676-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix Gene ChIP Scanner 3000 7G.
